summary: "TAKATA RECALL" I'VE CALLED MY DEALER SEVERAL TIMES AND THEY CAN'T REPLACE THE AIRBAG BECAUSE THE MANUFACTURER HASN'T PRODUCED A REPLACEMENT. PLEASE RESOLVE THIS IMPORTANT SAFETY ISSUE!
